1269443 THE SUPREME COURT JUDGES (CONDITIONS OF SERVICE) ACT, 1958
ACT NO. 41 OF 1958 [ 17th October, 1958.]
An Act to regulate certain conditions of service of the Judges of the Supreme Court.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Ninth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
CHAP

CHAPTER I

913073 iivacations;

422798 d" High Court" means the High Court for a State;
32512 e" Judge" means a Judge of the Supreme Court and includes the Chief Justice and an acting Chief Justice;
1617696 f" prescribed" means prescribed by rules made under this Act;
